title: Solr must declare crypto usage pending SOLR-284
description:
Since Solr will be shipping Tika in 1.4, which uses PDFBox, which uses BouncyCastle, Solr must declare it's Crypto usage per ASF guidelines.

See http://www.apache.org/dev/crypto.html
and https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NUTCH-621 for references and examples of what to do.

comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.content: Not that I am aware of.
